translation.en: Hey there, pretty.
What happened in there is what you young people refer to as epic.
translation.es: Lo que pasó ahí dentro es lo que los jóvenes califican de épico.

translation.en: Goddamn, Sax, you wreck my porcelain again?
Maybe. Want to guess from which end?
translation.es: Tal vez. ¿Quieres saber de qué extremo?

translation.en: - You costing me business, Sax. - Costing you business?
I am single- handedly keeping this shithole in the black.
translation.es: Yo solito mantengo esta basura sin deudas.

translation.en: You're going to miss me when I'm gone, Terrance.
- Not vodka. I give up, what is it? - Quit your bitching.
translation.es: - No es vodka. ¿Qué es? - Deja de quejarte.

translation.en: I could dissolve a body in this shit.
Goddamn Christmas miracle I'm still alive!
Saving yourself for some lucky girl, I guess.
translation.es: Te guardas para una linda chica.

translation.en: Well, ho, ho, ho. What's Santa got for me tonight?
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene Santa para mí esta noche?

translation.en: Please just take it.
Now, that's interesting.
Going to be a busy holiday season for you and me both by the looks of it.
translation.es: Serán unas Fiestas ocupadas, por lo que parece.

translation.en: - Don't know nothing about it, Satan. - Well, you have yourself a Merry...
translation.es: - No sé nada, Satanás. - Ten una linda Nav...

translation.en: Fuck it.
Sockatoo is my favorite.
No, Baballoon. No, Sockatoo.  I thought you liked the pink one.
translation.es: - No, Baballoon. No, Sockatoo. - Creí que te gustaba la rosada.

translation.en: She's the sick Wishee. You can tell from her spots.
translation.es: Es la Wishee enferma. Se nota por las manchas.

translation.en: Mm. Right.
And what about Happy? Which one's Happy's favorite?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hay de Happy? ¿Cuál es su favorito?

translation.en: Happy doesn't have a favorite.
He doesn't like Wishees. Do you, Happy?
translation.es: No le gustan las Wishees. ¿Cierto, Happy?

translation.en: He thinks that they're weirdos.
We got to go! We're going to be late!
And now, it's the moment you've all been waiting for.
translation.es: Y ahora, el momento que todos esperaban.

translation.en: They call him the man who made Christmas for thousands of underprivileged children.
translation.es: El hombre que dio una Navidad a miles de niños carenciados.

translation.en: Come on, Mom! It's starting! Come on!
He's the man who makes the sun shine!
translation.es: Es el hombre que hace brillar el sol.

translation.en: Sonny Shine!
Sonny Shine!
Not just one wish!
- Not just two! - Not just two wishes!
- But... - You get three wishes!
- Let me hear you say Wishees! - Wishees
You say Wishees! You say Wishees!
I can't see!
Why walk, when you can dance!
- I can't see! - I'm sorry.
Let's get closer!
Hailey? Hailey!
Hailey! Hailey! Hailey!
Don't worry, Happy. We'll go back.
There were too many people, I couldn't see!
But I only want one wish. That's not true. Don't be mean.
translation.es: Pero solo quiero un deseo. No es cierto, no seas malo.

translation.en: Mr. Sunshine! I only need one wish!
What do you mean run away? From who?
Here they come!
Hailey!
Hailey!
Hailey!
Yo, get a load of this snowflake, huh?
Little bitch changed up his look since then, right?
- Easy money. - No. This is not easy money.
translation.es: - Dinero fácil. - No. No es dinero fácil.

translation.en: Dude, chill. Three Scaramuccis
translation.es: Tranquilo. Tres Scaramucci contra un cretino idiota.

translation.en: against one Bum Fights looking motherfucker.
translation.es: ANTES SÚPER POLICÍA, AHORA, UN DESASTRE

translation.en: All right, we're gonna drop him like a hot deuce.
You never seen Sax doing work. I did.
translation.es: Nunca viste trabajar a Sax. Yo sí.

translation.en: What I can't figure is why Uncle Blue would wanna whack this guy.
translation.es: ¿Por qué el tío Blue querrá acabar con este tipo?

translation.en: Maybe he knows too much.
- Whoa! Mikey! -
Oh, my God! Look at you. Welcome home, little bro.
- Hey, no one knew you was back. - I left straight from the funeral.
translation.es: - Nadie sabía que volviste. - Vine directo del funeral.

translation.en: Hey, guys, a moment of silence for Don Scaramucci, God rest his soul.
translation.es: Un momento de silencio por Don Scaramucci. Que Dios reciba su alma.

translation.en: And to think, our little Michelangelo,
sitting right by the bedside as the great man peaced out.
translation.es: estuvo en el lecho de muerte de ese gran hombre.

translation.en: Yeah.
Looks like the four Smootchie bros are gonna kick some ass tonight.
translation.es: Parece que los cuatro hermanos patearemos traseros hoy.

translation.en: Hey, take a look at this job we just got.
translation.es: Mira el trabajo que nos dieron.

translation.en: Count me out. I got something for Uncle Blue.
translation.es: No cuenten conmigo. El tío Blue me encargó algo. Directo del Don.

translation.en: Straight from the Don. It can't wait.
translation.es: El tío Blue me encargó algo. Directo del Don.

translation.en: - What you got, Mikey? - Yeah. Bro. Fuck that.
A little ballistic therapy first, then go kiss the ring.
translation.es: Primero terapia balística. Luego vas a besar el anillo.

translation.en: All right, Uncle Freaky ain't going no place.
- Hey. Watch your mouth, dumbass. -
translation.es: Cuidado con lo que dices, tonto.

translation.en: You kidding me? The Don's dead so all of a sudden
translation.es: ¿Bromeas? El Don está muerto y ahora hay que...

translation.en: - we're supposed to bow-- - Christ's sake,
translation.es: El Don está muerto y ahora hay que...

translation.en: I ain't even unpacked yet.
What's up, little Mike?
You afraid of getting blood on your Dolce and Ga- fuckin- Bana?
translation.es: ¿Temes mancharte de sangre tu Dolce & Gabbana?

translation.en: So, it turns out they did some research.
- Statistical shit. - Listen, dude, could you hurry it up?
I have an eleven o'clock, supposed to be here any minute.
They proved that hookers,
see hookers like you, who work the holidays,
translation.es: como tú, que trabajan en las Fiestas,

translation.en: you share an economic niche with the department store Santa Claus.
translation.es: comparten un nicho económico con los Santa Claus de las tiendas.

translation.en: It's a time of giving. Empty 'em.
Empty 'em!
Empty my big shiny Christmas balls.
translation.es: Vacía mis grandes y brillosas bolas de Navidad.

translation.en: Now, here's something you don't see every day.
translation.es: Esto es algo que no se ve a menudo.

translation.en: I'm your eleven o'clock.
- Sorry, am I early? - Oh, shit.
Well, that's novel.
- Cockroach? - Prawn, it's like a shrimp.
- Um, please don't, please... - Look, you need to relax.
translation.es: - Por favor, no, por favor. - Tranquila.

translation.en: If I'd showed up on time, that hammer would be halfway through your skull.
translation.es: Si hubiera llegado a tiempo, el martillo estaría en tu cráneo.

translation.en: Oh, that's the last weirdo, I swear to God.
translation.es: Es el último raro, lo juro.

translation.en: Now's not the time to be making big decisions here.
translation.es: No es momento de tomar grandes decisiones.

translation.en: Hey, hey, I know you.
I don't think so.
Yeah. You're a... You're a cop, right? You busted me back in the day.
translation.es: Sí. Eres policía, ¿cierto? Una vez me atrapaste.

translation.en: You... You were a real gentleman. Didn't make a pass or anything.
translation.es: Fuiste un caballero. No te propasaste ni nada.

translation.en: Uh, you told me to get on a bus and go home. Get my act together.
translation.es: Me dijiste que fuera a casa e hiciera las cosas bien.

translation.en: You inspired me.
I can see that.
Yeah, well, you don't look like a cop no more.
translation.es: Bueno, ya no te ves como policía.

translation.en: - What happened? - Yeah, I'd be tickled to death
to have that conversation with you right now.
But I'd prefer to talk about how you're going to pay me back.
translation.es: Prefiero hablar de cómo vas a pagarme.

translation.en: Talk to me, bro. What's eating you, hm?
Huh? I know you. This ain't Disco Mikey.
translation.es: Te conozco. No eres Disco Mikey.

translation.en: I saw your Snapchat, the chicks, the wine.
translation.es: Vi tu Snapchat. Las chicas, el vino.

translation.en: You must've had the time of your life out there, huh?
Sure. Best ever.
You guys probably think I got some kind of big inheritance lined up.
translation.es: Seguro creen que recibiré una gran herencia.

translation.en: The Old Don hooked me up real good before he kicked it, right?
translation.es: Que el Don me dio mucho antes de morir.

translation.en: What? You saying it ain't true?
I mean, Don Scaramucci loved you like a son.
translation.es: Eras como un hijo para el Don.

translation.en: Picked you out of everybody in the family.
He left me something, all right... but not money.
translation.es: Me dejó algo, sí. Pero no es dinero.

translation.en: - This is the place. - Yo, what's the play, bro?
translation.es: - Este es el lugar. - ¿Qué pasó, hermano?

translation.en: All right, I got high specificity intel.
We're gonna catch this asshole, literally, with his pants down.
translation.es: Atraparemos a este idiota con los pantalones bajos.

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Go, go, go! Don't worry, Hailey. I'll find him!
translation.es: ¡No, no, no! ¡No te preocupes, Hailey, lo encontraré!

translation.en: What'd I tell you? Huh?
Holy shit.
What did I tell you, Mike? It's nothing, right?
translation.es: ¿Qué te dije, Mike? No es nada.

translation.en: You're not a fucking tough guy anymore, Sax!
translation.es: ¡Ya no eres un tipo rudo, Sax!

translation.en: Who's this?
- Pal Swipes Scaramouch. - No, you ain't. That's me.
translation.es: - Pal Swipes Scaramotch. - No. Ese soy yo.

translation.en: Oh, boy. And they told me you were the smart one.
translation.es: Y me dijeron que tú eras el más listo.

translation.en: All right, genius, if you can follow this,
translation.es: Escucha, genio: hablas con quien fue

translation.en: right now you're talking to the man who was hired
to kill the Scaramucci Brothers.
Now full confession, I am one lazy bastard.
translation.es: Pero te confieso: soy un cretino holgazán.

translation.en: So the problem is, how do I get all you squirrely assholes together in one place?
translation.es: El problema es: ¿cómo los pongo a todos juntos en un lugar?

translation.en: Solution, I call in a hit on that handsome son of a bitch Nick Sax.
translation.es: Solución: les encargo que asesinen al cretino de Nick Sax.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
I gather you all together in one place, lined up...
translation.es: Los reúno a todos en un solo lugar...

translation.en: Like a turkey shoot.
That's funny. I contracted for three.
translation.es: Qué raro. Yo contraté a tres. Un minuto.

translation.en: Wait a minute. You're the baby brother, right?
translation.es: Qué raro. Yo contraté a tres. Un minuto. Eres el hermano menor. Vaya, vaya. Ya creciste.

translation.en: Look at you. All grown up.
translation.es: Eres el hermano menor. Vaya, vaya. Ya creciste.

translation.en: - Hands shaking. Asshole flapping. - You...
Yeah, I killed your brothers. That's right. It's awkward.
translation.es: Sí, maté a tus hermanos. Qué incómodo.

translation.en: Well, that sucked.
- Say bye- bye. - Wait, wait, wait, wait!
Whatever you're getting paid. I've got something that's worth more.
translation.es: Lo que sea que le pagan, yo tengo mucho más.

translation.en: I'm listening.
It's... it's a password.
- I just stopped listening. - From the Old Don in Sicily.
translation.es: - No escucho más. - Del Don de Sicilia.

translation.en: Before he died, he gave me a password to an encrypted file.
translation.es: Me dio la contraseña de un archivo encriptado.

translation.en: It's a... It's a list of names. It's priceless.
translation.es: Es una lista de nombres. Invaluable.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't do priceless. I'm more of a cash and carry kind of guy.
translation.es: No me interesa lo invaluable. Prefiero el efectivo.

translation.en: Besides, it sounds like I'd be tortured and killed for it
translation.es: Y suena a que me van a torturar por ella

translation.en: by any number of interested parties.
So, while you're at it, why not give me, ass cancer?
translation.es: Así que sería lo mismo que darme cáncer de ano.

translation.en: Please, please.
Look, you're in a sharing kind of mood, I get it.
translation.es: Veo que tienes ganas de compartir.

translation.en: So, just tell it to your brothers.
translation.es: Así que dísela a tus hermanos.

translation.en: You... you... you're shot.
Yeah. But it's the heart attack I just had that's really got my attention.
translation.es: Sí. Pero es el ataque al corazón el que me llamó la atención.

translation.en: I got to join a spin class, eat more kale.
translation.es: Tengo que hacer bicicleta, comer verdura.

translation.en: What the...?
Perfect.
Hey! Hey, hey, mister, what about my money?
Mama, please, I been as good as I can. Forgive me, Mama.
translation.es: Mamá, he sido lo más bueno posible. Perdóname, mamá.

translation.en: Kid, if I remind you of your mama,
translation.es: Si te recuerdo a tu mamá,

translation.en: you got bigger problems than a hole in your gut.
If you just hear my confession, I can move on, Mama.
translation.es: Si oyes mi confesión, puedo morir en paz, mamá.

translation.en: Confession? Yeah, sure, knock yourself out.
Mama, the world, it's run by devils!
translation.es: ¡Mamá, el mundo está controlado por demonios!

translation.en: They... they look like people, but they're devils.
Great Grandpa, he showed me things, things I wish I never saw.
translation.es: El bisabuelo me mostró cosas que desearía no haber visto.

translation.en: I got to talk to you, Mama,
so then I won't have it in me anymore and then I can be free.
translation.es: para que ya no sea mi secreto y pueda ser libre.

translation.en: All right, I already told you once, pal, I won't tell you again,
translation.es: Ya te lo dije una vez, y no lo repetiré:

translation.en: I'm not interested.
That was easy.
Okay. All right, Nick.
All right, you're fine. You're fine. You're fine.
- Looks dead to me. - Less paperwork if he's dead.
translation.es: - Parece muerto. - Menos papeleo si está muerto.

translation.en: - - Oh! - Shit! Don't move, sir. Don't move. - Stay down.
translation.es: - ¡Mierda! No se mueva, señor. - Quédese quieto.

translation.en: What the hell is this? Put your guns back in your pants.
translation.es: ¿Qué diablos es esto? Guarden sus armas.

translation.en: Jesus.
He's breathing. What about this one?
Forty- five exit wound and a base jump from the third floor.
translation.es: Herida de cuarenta y cinco y salto del tercer piso.

translation.en: - Muchos muertos. - Disco Mikey Mootch.
Haven't seen him around in a while. Any witnesses?
translation.es: Hacía rato que no lo veía. ¿Algún testigo?

translation.en: Must have been one hell of a Christmas party.
Big guy down there, he do this?
I don't know what the little guy said. I didn't hear anything.
translation.es: No sé qué dijo el otro. No oí nada.

translation.en: What exactly is it you didn't hear?
The guy with the nice coat, he, uh... went all random.
translation.es: El tipo del abrigo lindo, se volvió loco.

translation.en: Started talking about a password or something.
translation.es: Hablaba de una contraseña o algo así.

translation.en: Password? You sure about that?
I guess you didn't happen to hear what it was.
translation.es: De seguro no escuchaste cuál era.

translation.en: Like I said, he just sort of whispered it and then... urgh.
translation.es: Como dije, la susurró y luego...

translation.en: Listen, I have been traumatized. Don't I get counseling or something?
He didn't mention this password to anyone else, right? Just... just the big guy?
translation.es: ¿Dijo la contraseña a alguien más? ¿Solo al grandote?

translation.en: Like I told you. Lady, I got every kind of thing that can
translation.es: Como le dije. Tengo todo lo que puede salir de un hombre sobre mí.

translation.en: come out of a guy all over me, can I please get out of here?
translation.es: Tengo todo lo que puede salir de un hombre sobre mí. ¿Puedo irme de aquí?

translation.en: Hey!
Hey!
Make sure you keep him alive, or I promise you, it's your balls.
translation.es: Asegúrate de que siga vivo o te arrancaré las bolas.

translation.en: Hey, what about me, huh? I've been violated.
Take her home. No stops along the way.
translation.es: Llévenla a su casa. Sin paradas en el camino.

translation.en: What do you want?
Detective, ma'am, look, the guy's been shot.
He's had a heart attack, maybe two heart attacks.
- The chances he makes it to-- - He'll live.
He always does.
So many lights! So many people! I'll never find him!
Yes, you will! Because you have to!
Where is he? Where is he?
Excuse me, can you help me? Of course not, he can't even see me!
translation.es: Disculpe, ¿puede ayudarme? Claro que no, ¡ni siquiera me ve!

translation.en: Jeez, I thought I was having a bad day.
translation.es: Rayos, y pensé que yo tenía un mal día.

translation.en: Okay, you two look busy.
Can you see me?
Yerks!
- Get over here! - Ah!
Whoa! Must be an easier way to order a drink!
Hey, you're going the wrong way! Hey, watch it, pal!
Whoa! Looks like someone's got a lot of Christmas cards to deliver!
translation.es: Parece que tiene muchas tarjetas que repartir.

translation.en: He's close, Hailey, I can feel it.
translation.es: Él está cerca, Hailey. Lo presiento.

translation.en: Actually, I can smell it.
He's got a vest!
- - Swirling, swirling.
- Clear! - Three, two, one!
It's like cooking a steak.
- Give him another. Three, two, one. - Three, two, one.
She said if we lose him, it's our balls. Do you think she meant that literally?
translation.es: Dijo que si lo perdemos nos arrancará las bolas.

translation.en: - Or, like... like a figure of speech - We're not gonna lose him.
translation.es: Tal vez no era literal. No lo perderemos.

translation.en: Pure adrenaline. I got to admit, I've always wanted to do this.
translation.es: Pura adrenalina. Lo admito. Siempre quise hacer esto.

translation.en: Morphine, 20 mgs, stat!
Oh, that's warm.
Nitroglycerine!
Twenty- four mgs. Ah!
Oh, yeah. That's it.
Hey, Mister!
Come on, snap out of it!
Wait a minute.
- You can see me! - What the hell?
Yeah, you weren't quite what I expected, either.
translation.es: Sí, tú tampoco eres lo que esperaba.

translation.en: I guess we get what we get and we don't get upset, right?
translation.es: Cada uno obtiene lo que le corresponde, sin quejas.

translation.en: Oh, boy. Well, here goes nothing.
translation.es: ¡Vaya! Bueno, no hay nada que perder.

translation.en: I'm Happy!
♪ The happy horse, horse, horse So full of fun of course, of course ♪
translation.es: El caballo feliz, feliz Muy divertido, te hará reír

translation.en: ♪ It's plain to see It's fun to be happy ♪
translation.es: Es obvio que es divertido ser feliz

translation.en: ♪ The happy horse, horse, horse Full of love, of course, of course! ♪
translation.es: El caballo feliz, feliz Lleno de amor y diversión

translation.en: ♪ It's fun to be carefree So come with me! ♪
- ♪ Happy! ♪ - ♪ Happy! ♪
Here it comes!
Here comes the fun! Are you ready?
- I'm ready. - Here it comes!
♪ Clippity clop, flippity flop We got no time to mope and mop ♪
translation.es: Clippity clop, no hay tiempo de deprimirnos

translation.en: ♪ Let's ride the magic rainbow Right to the tippy, tippy, tippy, tippy ♪
translation.es: Vamos por el arcoíris mágico hasta la punta, punta, punta...

translation.en: Stop! I'm hallucinating. Nitro.
Go away. Ah.
But... but... I got stuff to tell you! Mucho important stuff!
- I don't talk to pink elephants. - What are you, color blind?
translation.es: - No hablo con elefantes rosados. - ¿Qué? ¿Eres daltónico?

translation.en: I ain't pink, pal, and elephants have trunks.
translation.es: ¡No soy rosado! Y los elefantes tienen trompa.

translation.en: Do you see any luggage?
Kill this thing any way you can.
They can't see me. Only you can see me.
translation.es: Ellos no pueden verme. Solo tú puedes verme.

translation.en: Look, asshole, I'm going to take a nap now. - When I wake up, I want you to go. - Whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.es: Mira, idiota, voy a dormir. Cuando despierte, quiero que te vayas.

translation.en: Don't go! Not yet! Hailey needs us!
Well, usually, you're a great source of information,
translation.es: Sueles ser una gran fuente de información, pero esta vez

translation.en: but this time, I'm afraid you're mistaken.
translation.es: Sueles ser una gran fuente de información, pero esta vez me temo que te equivocas.

translation.en: My favorite nephew is currently on route from Italy.
translation.es: Mi sobrino favorito acaba de salir de Italia.

translation.en: Maybe he was yesterday. Right now he's in the county morgue.
translation.es: Tal vez ayer. Ahora está en la morgue del condado.

translation.en: And Nick Sax has got his fat, grubby fingers on my password.
translation.es: Y Nick Sax tiene sus mugrosos dedos en mi contraseña.

translation.en: Meredith, your father's on the TV again!
translation.es: ¡Meredith, tu padre está en TV otra vez!

translation.en: That evil bastard is so handsome.
You know, I can tell you're real broken up about
losing four nephews in one night, Blue.
translation.es: por perder a cuatro sobrinos en una noche, Blue.

translation.en: Maybe I should give you a little time to process.
How very compassionate of you, Detective McCarthy.
translation.es: Qué compasivo de tu parte, detective McCarthy.

translation.en: And during the holiday season.
translation.es: Y en época de las Fiestas.

translation.en: Gerry. Gerry, pay attention to Whiskers, please.
translation.es: Gerry, presta atención a Bigotes, por favor.

translation.en: - He's scratching. - It's the antlers, dear, he hates them.
translation.es: - Se está rascando. - Son los cuernos, los odia.

translation.en: Sax should be at General.
translation.es: Sax está en el Hospital General.

translation.en: I will be there when he wakes up and have a little chat.
translation.es: Estaré ahí cuando despierte y hablaré con él.

translation.en: And I hope that conversation goes very, very well.
translation.es: Y espero que esa conversación sea muy, muy buena.

translation.en: The thought that that slow troglodyte might actually die
translation.es: Pensar que ese troglodita podría morir antes de que yo obtenga

translation.en: before I get what I need out of him, well, I'm sure you understand.
translation.es: lo que necesito de él... Bueno, seguro entiendes

translation.en: It won't be you that I come to vent my spleen on.
translation.es: que no será contigo con quien me queje.

translation.en: How is your ma? Silly, fragile, old thing.
translation.es: ¿Cómo está tu madre? Esa anciana frágil.

translation.en: She been taking her medication?
My daughter doesn't care. She doesn't give a damn about... she...
translation.es: A mi hija no le interesa. No le importa nada...

translation.en: Meredith?
- Meredith? - He'll talk.
There's something you're not telling me, Blue.
translation.es: Hay algo que no me dices, Blue.

translation.en: I mean, first, the Old Don dies on the other side of the world,
translation.es: Primero muere el Don del otro lado del mundo.

translation.en: then, 24 hours, later there's four dead Scaramuccis in Brooklyn.
translation.es: Un día después, hay cuatro Scaramucci muertos.

translation.en: What's going on out there?
Tell your ma I said she has to start taking her pills.
translation.es: Dile a tu mamá que tiene que tomar sus píldoras.

translation.en: I can see where you get your stubborn streak.
translation.es: Ya veo por qué eres testaruda.

translation.en: Gerry! Little angel.
- Yes, Papa? - I don't want to tell you again.
If Whiskers won't stop scratching, I'm gonna have to put him on the fire.
translation.es: Si Bigotes no deja de rascarse, lo voy a rostizar.

translation.en: And that will be four dogs we've gone through in the last year.
translation.es: Y será el cuarto perro en un año...

translation.en: Socks, J. Edgar Woofer, Professor Buttons
translation.es: Patitas, J. Edgar Guau-ver, el Profesor Botones.

translation.en: and now... and now Whiskers.
- - So please, little...
Smoothie!
Happy Holidays!
And a happy holidays to you, Mister Blue!
Thirty- nine inches. Forty- seven pounds. Blood type, O- negative.
translation.es: Cien centímetros. Veinte kilos. Sangre 0 negativo.

translation.en: This backpack she had on. What color was it?
- I told you, pink. - Pink, right, right.
translation.es: - Ya le dije: rosada. - Rosada, sí.

translation.en: Would you say it's like Pepto, or more of a pastel?
translation.es: ¿Rosa como el de Pepto? ¿O un tono pastel?

translation.en: It was pink. Pink, pink. With Wishees all over it.
translation.es: Era rosada. Rosada. Y decía Wishees.

translation.en: Wishees? Kids love that shit, don't they?
- I printed her myself, two years ago. - Really?
translation.es: - Yo se la hice. Hace dos años. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: - And the father? - It's just me and my daughter.
translation.es: -¿Y el padre? - Somos solo mi hija y yo.

translation.en: Got everything we need to start the investigation on Ashley.
translation.es: Ya podemos empezar a buscar a Ashley.

translation.en: Hailey!
Hailey Hansen.
- I want to speak to Captain Rollins. - Rollins?
translation.es: - Quiero hablar con el capitán Rollins. - ¿Rollins?

translation.en: And if he's not here, Byrnes, tell him it's Amanda Hansen.
translation.es: Y si no está, con Byrnes. Dígale que soy Amanda Hansen.

translation.en: Listen.
I know this is tough, but we're on it.
translation.es: Sé que es duro. Pero estamos en eso.

translation.en: Go home. Get some sleep if you can.
translation.es: Vaya a casa. Duerma un poco. Si puede.

translation.en: And I have someone you can talk to in the morning.
translation.es: Podrá hablar con alguien en la mañana.

translation.en: I died.
I really did it.
I really did it.
And I'm in hell.
Not one wish, not two wishes, but three! You should be so lucky.
translation.es: - No un deseo sino dos o tres. - Sí, claro.

translation.en: - Oh, I bet that feels good, huh? - It ain't nothing.
translation.es: - Se siente bien. - No es nada.

translation.en: Massive cardiac arrest, point- blank bullet impact, upper torso.
translation.es: Paro cardíaco masivo. Un impacto de bala en el torso, a quemarropa.

translation.en: Had hangovers worse than this.
What?
I'm an invalid. Open up a window.
Window!
It's against the law to smoke in a hospital. You know that, don't you?
translation.es: Es ilegal fumar en el hospital. Lo sabes, ¿cierto?

translation.en: Get it in gear. Open up a window, will you?
Not that window. No, no, no! No, no, no, no! Close! Close it!
translation.es: Esa ventana no. ¡No, no, no! ¡Ciérrala, ciérrala!

translation.en: Lucky for me she opened that window,
I was about to turn into a blueberry horse- sicle!
Excuse me.
translation.es: - Disculpa. - Te dije que te fueras.

translation.en: - I'm pretty sure I told you to fuck off. - Oh, you did. A few times.
translation.es: - Disculpa. - Te dije que te fueras. - Sí. Varias veces. - No a ti.

translation.en: Not you.
translation.es: - Sí. Varias veces. - No a ti.

translation.en: - TV's off, Nick. - Huh? I know.
translation.es: - La TV está apagada, Nick. - Lo sé.

translation.en: Meredith.
What are you here for?
Nick Sax. Hard to believe this piece of shit in front of me used to be
translation.es: Nick Sax. Me cuesta creer que esta mierda

translation.en: the best detective in the whole department.
translation.es: era el mejor detective del departamento.

translation.en: - Yeah, well, I was a real hero. - You were mine.
translation.es: - Bueno, era un verdadero héroe. - Eras el mío.

translation.en: Wife of yours was smart to get out when she did.
translation.es: Tu esposa fue lista al irse.

translation.en: Come on, you didn't come here to go there. Don't go there.
translation.es: No viniste a hablar de eso.

translation.en: - Boy, she's a regular Good Time Pam. - Get off!
- There's something wrong with you. - You have no idea.
translation.es: - Algo te pasa. - No tienes idea.

translation.en: Why couldn't you have just left me out on the street?
Why do you think you're here?
- Here. - Huh?
Yeah. General.
Some pension. Get shot just going about your business
translation.es: Vaya pensión. Te disparan mientras trabajas y terminas aquí.

translation.en: and the best they can do is a mob hospital.
translation.es: Te disparan mientras trabajas y terminas aquí.

translation.en: I think I still got some of your business on my shoe.
translation.es: Tengo tu trabajo en mi zapato.

translation.en: You know, I know what Disco Mikey told you.
translation.es: Sé lo que te dijo Disco Mikey.

translation.en: You're in deep shit.
You're in deep Bandini, Nick. That means a bad word.
translation.es: Estás bandini, Nick. Es una mala palabra.

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
Mikey gave you a password meant for Blue.
translation.es: Mikey te dio una contraseña que era para Blue.

translation.en: Dumb kid ran into you before he had a chance to deliver it.
translation.es: El tonto se cruzó contigo antes de entregarla.

translation.en: I think you know what they'll do to get it out of you, unless you tell me first.
translation.es: Sabes lo que te harán para conseguirla. O dámela primero.

translation.en: Password?
- Oh, I know! Open Sesame! - Seriously?
- Listen to me. - Go.
I think Blue hired you to kill his nephews.
translation.es: Blue te contrató para matar a sus sobrinos.

translation.en: Mikey just ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time.
translation.es: Mikey estaba en el lugar equivocado.

translation.en: I think there is a goddamn underworld civil war brewing
translation.es: Creo que hay una guerra civil

translation.en: and you've landed your sorry ass right in the middle of it.
translation.es: y tú quedaste en medio de ella.

translation.en: I think I can still get you out, but you have to tell me what you know.
translation.es: Creo que puedo salvarte, pero dime lo que sabes.

translation.en: What I know.
That people suck, I don't pay income tax
translation.es: La gente es un asco. No pagues nada.

translation.en: and I no longer feel dirty when I touch myself.
translation.es: No me siento mal si me toco.

translation.en: But, beyond that, it's just seems pretty clear that whoever knows this alleged password
translation.es: Está claro que quien sepa esa supuesta contraseña

translation.en: is as good as dead or worse.
That's about it.
Oh, Meredith, you're such a pain in the ass. You deserve better than that.
translation.es: Meredith, eres una molestia. Pero mereces algo mejor. Gracias por venir.

translation.en: Thanks for coming in. I appreciate it and I will tell you this...
translation.es: Pero mereces algo mejor. Gracias por venir. Pero te diré:

translation.en: Get the hell out of here.
Comprendo?
- It's comprende. It's Spanish. - I know it's Spanish!
translation.es: - Es comprende. Es español. - ¡Ya sé que es español!

translation.en: All right, then.
It is what it is.
It sure ain't what it ain't.
Well, about time she left. What a charmer.
translation.es: Ya era hora de que se fuera.

translation.en: Look, I don't want to speak out of school, Nick,
but I think she might have a thing for you.
- Oh, I'm going to lose my lunch. - It's the oxycodone.
translation.es: - Perderé mi almuerzo. - Es la oxicodona.

translation.en: Pull it together, Sax. You're hallucinating. That's bad.
translation.es: Vamos, Sax. Estás alucinando. Eso es malo.

translation.en: Some kind of reaction.
Who you talking to, Nick?
You know, I used to know a guy who would talk himself
translation.es: Conocí a un hombre que hablaba con él mismo,

translation.en: and he ended up in the funny farm! He's, like, cuckoo, you know?
translation.es: ¡y terminó en un manicomio! Está loco.

translation.en: Bing! Bing! Bing! Cuckoo!
So, you're some kind of manifestation of my subconscious, right?
translation.es: Bien. Eres una manifestación de mi subconsciente, ¿cierto?

translation.en: You lost me at so.
Something about a submarine sandwich?
Breathe. Breathe. Breathe. Okay, breathe.
Five, four, three, two, one.
This is no time for hide and seek, Nick, even though I love it.
translation.es: No juegues a esconderte, Nick. Aunque me encanta.

translation.en: Besides, peeking is cheating.
- You're not real. - Of course not. I'm an imaginary friend.
translation.es: - No eres real. - No. Soy un amigo imaginario.

translation.en: My imagination is very limited.
It usually involves inflicting pain in ways that may not have occurred to most.
translation.es: Suele incluir infligir dolor de formas que a muchos no se les ocurrieron.

translation.en: You're funny, Nick, but I ain't your imaginary friend.
translation.es: Eres gracioso, Nick. Pero no soy tu amigo imaginario.

translation.en: I don't even want to think about what that would look like.
translation.es: Ni quiero pensar en cómo sería eso.

translation.en: - I'm Hailey's imaginary friend. - Right.
translation.es: - Soy el amigo imaginario de Hailey. - Claro.

translation.en: Hailey's a little girl, Nick, the sweetest, most adorable little girl
translation.es: Hailey es una niñita. La niña más dulce y adorable del mundo.

translation.en: in the whole world, but... but she's in real bad trouble and you're the only one
translation.es: La niña más dulce y adorable del mundo. Pero está en problemas, y solo tú puedes ayudarme a salvarla.

translation.en: - that can help me save her. -
translation.es: y solo tú puedes ayudarme a salvarla.

translation.en: No exit this way, Nick.
Jesus. That was a bad one. Damn pills are going to kill me.
translation.es: Dios mío. Qué mal. Las píldoras me matarán.

translation.en: All right.
- We got company, Nick! - And he's back!
- Some real creepazoids. - Hey, if you want to be useful,
translation.es: - Unos malvados. - Si quieres ser útil...

translation.en: why don't you tell me how many I'm dealing with?
Okay, one, two, three, four, uh, five!
- Are you sure about that? - Uh- huh.
So, five, I've done five. I can do five.
translation.es: Cinco. No está tan mal. Puedo con 5.

translation.en: Here they come! Here they come! Here they come!
Tick tock. Time to rock.
No, that's not going to do.
Hey! Hey! Hey!
- That's better. - Woo.
Some help you turned out to be.
No offense, buddy, but I don't see how we're going to save Hailey
translation.es: No te ofendas, pero no sé cómo

translation.en: if you keep fainting at the first sign of trouble!
translation.es: salvaremos a Hailey si te desmayas.

translation.en: Why are you whispering?
Okay. Drug- induced dementia is a luxury that you will no longer get to enjoy.
translation.es: La demencia inducida es un lujo que ya no podrás disfrutar.

translation.en: I am going to need your complete focus and attention.
Smoothie?
Clearly my reputation precedes me.
Well, I heard you like to get pee- peed on if that's what you mean.
translation.es: Oí que te gusta que te orinen.

translation.en: - - Thanks for the cosign.
Hey, there's nothing wrong with it, no shame.
I hear a lot of people are into that sort of thing. Oh!
I got video!
I beg your pardon? Nothing?
- What? - Look, asshole, let's get this over with.
You want Disco Mikey's password.
- Oh, I'll get that, believe me. - Yeah, of course you will.
I'm a tough nut, but you'll crack it, all right.
Why don't we just cut out the middle man and just get down to it, huh?
I'll spill the beans. I got no illusions that it will buy me a quick death,
translation.es: Yo hablaré. No me comprará una muerte rápida,

translation.en: but I mean, what the hell? We all got places to go, people to meet.
translation.es: pero todos tenemos lugares para ir, gente por ver.

translation.en: I couldn't have put it better myself.
Yeah, so, the kid is sitting there lying in my arms...
translation.es: El chico estaba en mis brazos,

translation.en: sour smell of homemade lasagna on his breath
as he presses his cold, clammy lips to my ear and...
translation.es: y puso sus labios fríos contra mi oído y...

translation.en: he whispers it to me... right before he croaks.
I'll never forget the words he utters, he says...
Tinkle, tinkle.
Oh, I am going to get the words, believe me.
translation.es: Voy a conseguir las palabras, créeme.

translation.en: But I'm going to take my time.
I'm going to set an example with you.
translation.es: Voy a dar un ejemplo contigo.

translation.en: - Do you want to know why? - Not really.
Because I am a professional.
I take pride in my work.
I approach my assignments with precision, discipline and respect for my employers.
translation.es: Soy preciso, disciplinado y respeto a mis empleadores.

translation.en: You see, Sax, your reputation precedes you as well.
translation.es: Sax, tu reputación también te precede.

translation.en: You seem to look at each new job as an opportunity to fulfill
translation.es: Cada trabajo nuevo es una oportunidad

translation.en: some half- acknowledged death wish.
translation.es: de cumplir un deseo de muerte sin querer.

translation.en: You just don't get it, do you, Smoothie?
My life is an ever- swirling toilet that just won't flush.
translation.es: Mi vida es un retrete giratorio cuya agua no se va.

translation.en: I don't think I can die.
We'll see.
Music, please.
Wow, was that as creepy as I felt? Creepy, right?
translation.es: ¿Eso fue tan aterrador como se sintió?

translation.en: I am going to remove your penis...
translation.es: Te voy a quitar el pene.

translation.en: in thin slices, like salami... just for starters.
translation.es: En rodajas finas, como el salame. De entrada.

translation.en: Uh, it's going to take you a long time. You know what I mean?
translation.es: Te llevará mucho tiempo. Ya sabes.

translation.en: That's okay.
I don't think I can watch! Come on, Nick! Do something!
Well, you know, after a while it just gets harder and harder
translation.es: Con el tiempo es más difícil buscar un motivo

translation.en: to find a reason to keep on going.
There's two kinds of people in this godforsaken world,
translation.es: ¡Hay dos tipos de personas en este mundo,

translation.en: you worthless, little maggot! Which kind do you want to be?
translation.es: gusano inútil! ¿De qué tipo quieres ser? ¿De las buenas o de las malas?

translation.en: A good apple, or a road apple?
translation.es: ¿De qué tipo quieres ser? ¿De las buenas o de las malas?

translation.en: - Oops! I pooped. - Oh, for Christ's sakes.
Yeah!
Yeah, okay. Well, I think you made your point,
translation.es: Bueno, creo que probaste tu punto.

translation.en: so can we go back saving Hailey?
- Now, is he going to be okay? - No!
No, he is not going to be okay.
translation.es: No, no va a estar bien.

translation.en: Hey there, didn't see you.
Oh, yeah, Papi. Huh?
Like that?
I can explain.
Shoot to wound, man.
translation.es: No lo mates. Blue lo quiere vivo.

translation.en: - Blue wants him alive. - Well, that's interesting.
translation.es: No lo mates. Blue lo quiere vivo. Qué interesante.

translation.en: We'll tango later there, angry eyes. Gentlemen.
Let's go this way!
- Get him! - No, let's not go that way.
- - Back off or the horse gets it!
On the stairway! Follow me! Let's go!
Hold it!
I'm actually really good at this. Nice jacket.
translation.es: Soy bueno en esto. Linda bata.

translation.en: I'm Doctor Who's This Here and I need some... having a... rough day.
translation.es: Soy el doctor Quién es, y necesito... Tengo un mal día.

translation.en: What are you staring at?
Tough tonsillectomy. Kid'll pull through though.
translation.es: Una cirugía difícil. Pero el niño saldrá bien.

translation.en: Better?
- Actually, yeah. - Then, let's go save Hailey! Come on!
Let's go! Get out of the way!
Yerks! More bad guys coming, Nick!
I need less bad guys and more good news out of you.
translation.es: Quiero menos malos y más buenas noticias.

translation.en: We're in a family- size jar of pickles, Nick!
translation.es: ¡Estamos en una frasco de pepinillos, Nick!

translation.en: I've no idea what that means.
What the heck, Nick! There's no elevator and you can't fly! Can you?
translation.es: ¡Nick! ¡No hay elevador y no puedes volar! - ¿O sí? - Tercer piso.

translation.en: Third floor.
Oh, yeah. You got the loco eyes, buddy.
translation.es: Sí. Tienes ojos de loco, amigo.

translation.en: You know what? You can't help me save Hailey if you're dead- zo- roni!
translation.es: ¡No podrás salvar a Hailey si mueres!

translation.en: Yeah, about this Hailey you keep yammering on about.
translation.es: Esta Hailey de la que hablas...

translation.en: To hell with her and while you're at it, to hell with you.
translation.es: Que se vaya al diablo. Y tú también.

translation.en: - - Hey, come on, don't do that.
How did you know there were five?
Back in my room, the creepazoids coming for me. You're a manifestation, but...
translation.es: Los malos que venían por mí. Eres una manifestación.

translation.en: - How did you know there were five? - Yerk.
Whoa! What? Oh!
Woo- hoo! Are we the best team or what?
Oh, hey, Merry.
- Nick. - Yerks.
Can I borrow your car?
You son of a bitch.
Come on! Come on, where we going, Nick, huh? Where we going, huh?
We? We ain't going nowhere. You heard that nice lady back there.
translation.es: No iremos a ningún lado. Ya oíste a la dama.

translation.en: I signed my own death warrant when I iced Disco Mikey.
translation.es: Firmé mi sentencia al matar a Mikey.

translation.en: Every scumbag in the city will be looking for me.
translation.es: Todo matón de la ciudad... - ... estará buscándome. - Sí, pero...

translation.en: Uh, I mean, yeah, but...
Yeah, but, yeah, but nothing. I'm getting the hell out of Dodge.
translation.es: Sí, pero nada. Me iré de aquí.

translation.en: Quit your tap dancing. You're ruining the dashboard.
translation.es: Deja de zapatear. Arruinas el tablero.

translation.en: - I didn't want to tell you, Nick. - So, then, don't.
translation.es: - No quería decírtelo, Nick. - No lo hagas.

translation.en: I was afraid of scaring you away. After all, you left her once before.
translation.es: Temía asustarte. Después de todo, ya la dejaste antes.

translation.en: - Maybe you just don't want to be a daddy. - What are you yammering on about?
translation.es: - Tal vez no quieras ser papá. - ¿De qué hablas?

translation.en: - Why do you think I picked you, Nick? - I don't know. Lucky, I guess.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué crees que te elegí? - No lo sé. Tengo suerte.

translation.en: You can say that again. Nick, Hailey is your daughter.
translation.es: Puedes repetirlo. Nick, Hailey es tu hija.

translation.en: ♪ Toys and... toys and... ♪
translation.es: Juguetes y niñitas Juguetes, niñitas y niños

translation.en: ♪ Little girls and boys ♪
Happy?
Happy?
